attributes.action: Grime music should be allowed on radio stations as it is still a type on music.
attributes.additional_details: Grime music is a type of genre that takes a lot of talent to be able to rap at the speed they do. At the moment there talent is a lot harder to get noticed. It is a very unique genre of music. There's no reason for it not to be allowed. There for i think grime music should be allowed on radio stations such as BBC radio 1, Capital FM etc.
